title: LinuxCBT Security Edition
description:
LINUX CBT SECURITY EDITION
==========================

PLATFORMS : ALL

GENRE     : VIDEO TUTORIAL

DURATION  : 89 HOURS



REQUIREMENTS :
**************

BROWSER WITH FLASH PLAYER AND MEDIA PLAYER THAT CAN PLAY AVI & FLV FILES



CONTENTS :
**********

1. SECURITY BASICS (FUNDAMENTALS)
2. PROXY SECURITY FEATURING SQUID
3. FIREWALL SECURITY FEATURING IPTABLES
4. SELINUX SECURITY : MAC-BASED SECURITY CONTROLS
5. NIDS FEATURING SNORT
6. PACKET CAPTURE ANALYSIS FEATURING ETHEREAL
7. PLUGGABLE AUTHENTICATION MODULES (PAM)
8. OPEN SECURE SHELL VERSION 2 (OPENSSHV2)
9. OPENPGP WITH GNU PRIVACY GUARD (GPG)



INSTALL NOTES :
***************

1. EXTRACT 7ZIP FILE

2. NO NEED TO BURN OR MOUNT. FILES ARE ALREADY EXTRACTED FROM ORIGINAL ISOS

3. READ INSTRUCTIONS FOR VIEWING VIDEOS




INFO : http://www.linuxcbt.com/products_linuxcbt_security_edition.php
